title._content: ["Ballyshear," Charles Blair MacDonald house, Shinnecock Hills, Southampton, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Ballyshear," Charles Blair MacDonald house, Shinnecock Hills, Southampton, New York. Flower garden] [ca. 1915] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House Architecture: Francis Burrall Hoffman, Jr., completed 1913. Landscape: Rose Standish Nichols, completed 1913, and Seth Jay Raynor. Today:: House extant with changes, grardens not extant. On slide (handwritten): "M" and "Macdonald." Photographed when Frances Benjamin Johnston and Mattie Edwards Hewitt worked together. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Published in Gardens for a Beautiful America / Sam Watters. New York: Acanthus Press, 2012. Plate 81. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16880 Call Number: LC-J717-X109- 75
